scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --dir packages/db exec prisma migrate deploy --schema=./schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:dev: pnpm --dir packages/db exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./schema.prisma --name safe_update
scripts.migrate:deploy: pnpm --dir packages/db exec prisma migrate deploy --schema=./schema.prisma
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/web build
